summary: Iteration 41 - Tested new competitor features: Timetable Management, Certificate Generator, Exam & Report Card, Fee Management. All pages load correctly with proper UI components. Backend APIs working (18/19 tests passed). One test failed due to duplicate /api/exams POST route conflict.

critical.issue: Duplicate route conflict - Two POST /api/exams endpoints exist (line 7672 for online exams with questions, line 10571 for exam management). The first route requires 'questions' field which the new exam management doesn't provide.

action_items: Fix duplicate POST /api/exams route - rename new exam management endpoint to /api/exam-management or consolidate routes
critical_code_review_comments: Duplicate API routes at lines 7672 and 10571 for POST /api/exams - causes validation error when creating exams from ExamReportCard page

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages load, all tabs work, all dialogs open)

seed_data_creation: Created test timetable slot, test certificate, test exam, test marks during API testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features added: Timetable Management (/app/timetable-management), Certificate Generator (/app/certificates), Exam & Report Card (/app/exam-report). All UI components working. Backend has duplicate /api/exams POST route that needs fixing.
